titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years Representatives and Senators may serve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 12/14/2009--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Limits Members of the House of Representatives to nine terms and Members of the Senate to three terms.
